component.name: Eisenhower Matrix
component.summary: Organize tasks by urgency and importance

description.p: Eisenhower Matrix is a task prioritization tool that helps you organize your work by categorizing tasks into four quadrants based on their urgency and importance.
Named after President Dwight D. Eisenhower, this productivity method helps you focus on what truly matters by distinguishing between tasks that are:

ul.li: Urgent & Important (Do First) - Critical tasks requiring immediate attention
Important, Not Urgent (Schedule) - Long-term goals and strategic planning
Urgent, Not Important (Delegate) - Tasks that can be delegated to others
Not Urgent, Not Important (Eliminate) - Time-wasters to minimize
Beautiful, modern GTK4 interface with libadwaita
Four-quadrant visual layout for easy task organization
Add, complete, move, and delete tasks with ease
Persistent storage of your task data
